image_models.data_handeling package¶

Submodules¶

image_models.data_handeling.generators module¶

image_models.data_handeling.tools module¶

:w Created on Tue Apr 9 10:19:59 2019

@author: Keith Butler

image_models.data_handeling.tools.build_list_images(datapath, types=None)[source]¶

Builds a list of all image files in a given directory :param datapath: the location to search :param types: a tuple of the extensions to search, if unspecified a list of defaults is checked

Returns

a list of the datapaths to the images

Return type

paths

image_models.data_handeling.tools.normalise_discritise_data(img, mask, flag_multi_class=False, num_class=2, debug=False)[source]¶

Processes the image data to make it ready for the NN. Converts mask into a range of integer values. Normalises the image values. :param img: The image as an array :param mask: The mask as an array :param flag_multi_class: boolean, is this a multiclass or binary classification :param num_class: integer, the number of classes

Returns

The image normalised mask: The mask converted to intergers by class

Return type

img

image_models.data_handeling.tools.undersample_dataframe(df, label='label')[source]¶

Balances a class imbalanced dataframe by undersampling. Takes the size of the smallest class and cuts all classes to that size, randomly selecting members to fit the proportion. :param df: The input dataframe (Pandas dataframe object) :param label: The label of the column to sort by (string, default label)

Returns

The class balanced dataframe (Pandas dataframe object)

Return type

df_bal
